title: I have figured out why Riot has been pushing so much LC$!!!
body:
its the crazy swag people blow tons of money on who attend. the teemo hats, rammus hats, Cosplaying stuff. I even saw some garen foam swords and corki hats, ziggs hats. I thought they were custom made, but no, I started seeing repeats. Riot is cranking out cheaply made, high cost products to make HUGE profit margins! 1 attendee probably spends more in 1 day than most league players spend on in 1-2 years through RP.

Riot is stackin' bank rolls off of the LCS. good for them. maybe they can hire more help to make the actual game better... lol yeah right.
